mapper.select: SELECT tr.id, tr.name, tr.label, tr.parent_id, tr.method, tr.route, tr.create_time FROM tb_user AS tu LEFT JOIN tb_user_role tur ON tur.user_id = tu.id LEFT JOIN tb_role AS tr2 ON tr2.id = tur.role_id LEFT JOIN tb_role_resource AS trr ON trr.role_id = tr2.id LEFT JOIN tb_resource tr ON tr.id = trr.resource_id WHERE tu.id = #{userId}
